mean_cn: n. 银行，库，岩，堤；  v. 把（钱）存入银行
mean_en: a business where people keep their money, borrow money, etc., or the building where such a business operates
word_etyma: bank=bench长椅→由柜台转化而来 → 银行
deformation_desc: 最后的字母K是不是很像atm机的侧面呢？
sentence: Is my bank a safe place to keep my money?
sentence_trans: 我的银行是保管钱的安全之所吗？
